scripts.build: react-scripts build && junctions-static build -m build/static/js/main.*.js -r create-react-app
scripts.publish: npm run clean && npm run build && cp ../CNAME ./build && cd build && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update docs' && git push git@github.com:jamesknelson/junctions gh-pages --force
